ygData.subject: Re: KitKat/Battera
ygData.msgSnippet: KitKat:: She went to the med bay and found a small diognosic hook-up.  She pluged into it and ran a systems check on herself. She found no unknown programs.

KitKat::

She went to the med bay and found a small diognosic hook-up.  She 
pluged into it and ran a systems check on herself. She found no 
unknown programs. She sighed as the scan showed she was normal. She 
was about to shut if off when the screen showed a few new programs in 
her systems.  She analyzed two of the the three new programs. One she 
could not figure out because it was sealed and would not allow her 
access. The others were small personality programs. But to her, it 
was enraging. She saw that one was boosting her fighting instincts.

Thinks, No Wonder I'm always itching for a fight. This is boosting 
it. If I can just knock it down...

She managed to get most of the program knocked down.
Next she saw the 3rd program was just an energy booster to give her 
extra strength in battle, or when she was angry, which helped explain 
why she was extra jittery when she was mad. And that also helped to 
explain why she seemed mad all the time.  She shut that program down 
too.  With a sigh, she unhooked herself and walked back to the 
entrance. She was puzzled as to the the one program she couldn't even 
see. It was blocked to her, yet it was running. Something in the back 
of her mind bothered her, but she couldn't seem to find the answers. 
Well, with the two she did shut off, off, now she could think with a 
clearer head.  She returned to the entrance, gently placed a hand on 
SHarpClaws's shoulder. "How's our friend doing?"
